title: 9 Best Showers Curtains on Amazon for a Quick and Easy Bathroom Refresh
description: We found attractive styles, all under $50
author: Blake Bakkila
excerpt: We found the most attractive shower curtains on Amazon—whether you're a minimalist or maximalist—all under $50.

Fair warning: Hooks are not supplied, so you’ll want to choose one that works well with your bathroom’s existing finishes.BTTN 78-Inch Long Shower CurtainSolids are the ultimate pairing to balance out a bathroom with patterned tiling or wallpaper, and this trustworthy curtain is backed by thousands of five-star reviews on Amazon. The heavy duty linen material is grounding and slightly casual, welcoming virtually any other bathroom decor into your space.
html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

Featured in this article

Whether your aesthetic leans modern-minimalist, traditional, or transitional, the best shower curtains on Amazon offer a variety of textures, materials, and colorways to revitalize your bathroom. There are two main routes you can take with your bath curtain: Selecting a neutral style blends into a more relaxing, spa-like ambience, or go with a punchier pick that makes a statement with bold colors and patterns. Most of our favorites are machine washable and under $50, proving you don’t need to spend much to make a significant change in your bathroom—(and all of these are Prime-eligible, meaning speedy two-day shipping for members). Pair your new curtain with a bath mat and the perfect plush towel set for an instant redesign.

For reference, the standard size for a bath curtain is 72"W x 72"L, but a couple of our selections are considered “extra long” at 75"L or 78"L.

Our Top Picks for the Best Amazon Shower Curtains

  • For a Classic Look: Cackleberry Home Stripe Shower Curtain, $46 Amazon
  • For Coastal Elegance: HALL & PERRY Stripe Shower Curtain with Tassels, $26 Amazon
  • Most Cottagecore Vibe: Eddie Bauer Shower Curtain, $26 Amazon
  • Best Maximalist Design: Tritard Brown Scalloped Shower Curtain, $26 Amazon
  • Best Set: Jowels Linen Shower Curtain and Liner Set, $43 Amazon

  • For a Classic Look

    1/5

    Cackleberry Home Black and White Ticking Stripe Woven Cotton Shower Curtain

    We don’t have a crystal ball, but stripes will (hopefully) never go out of style. The classic pattern is as versatile as it is chic, and this small business uses 100% cotton for their fabric shower curtains and plenty of other high-quality home goods. If you can’t get enough of the fabric, Cackleberry Home also makes window treatments and kitchen towels.

  • For Coastal Elegance

    2/5

    Hall & Perry Modern Transitional Stripe Shower Curtain with Tassels

    Calling all coastal homes and modern farmhouses: a striped shower curtain like this one perfect for displaying around a roll top bath. The tassels bring in a more laidback, bohemian aesthetic, making it the ideal evergreen component for a less formal washroom.

  • Most Cottagecore Vibe

    3/5

    Eddie Bauer Shower Curtain

    Plaid has a tendency to make everything cozier, and that extends to the shower too. This sage green shower curtain would feel equally at home in a Martha’s Vineyard summer hideaway or in an updated cabin in North Carolina. The curtain is made with a lightweight cotton material for an airy feel, but the opacity still gives you plenty of privacy and coverage.

  • Best Maximalist Design

    4/5

    Jowels Linen Shower Curtain and Liner Set

    Linen is a popular summertime material for sheets, but it’s a year-round staple for homes with a multitude of aesthetics, thanks to its versatility. We’re talking couch upholstery, Roman shades, and yes, your bathroom shower curtain too. The two-layer design on this off-white shower curtain set features a sheer panel at the top to let more light in, and the outer material is made with 20 percent linen for a softer, more luxurious feel. And since everything is built into the hookless design, it doesn’t require a shower curtain liner or hooks.

  • Best Set

    5/5

    Tritard Scalloped Shower Curtain

    Scalloped edges are a cottagecore mainstay, but they can have modern applications too. If you have scalloped bedding, for instance, you can add consistency in an en suite bathroom with this linen shower curtain. To make installation a breeze, your purchase comes with 12 compatible shower curtain hooks to match the metal grommets.

More AD-Approved Shower Curtains

Madison Park Spa Waffle Shower Curtain

Stripes strike again with this hotel-style curtain featuring textural white stripes in a waffle material. From a performance standpoint, it’s pre-treated with water repellent Scotchgard to prevent wear and tear.

Awellife Shower Curtain

With a classic English cottage feel, this delicate blue and white floral pattern adds a charming and whimsical touch to any bathroom, but other colorways are also available. It comes with a set of white shower curtain rings to match the crisp white base, and you can pair it with a coordinating blue and white microfiber bath mat.

Worthwhile Goods Neutral Half Circle Shower Curtain

The beige and white give this otherwise chaotic pattern a serene palette to work with, while the geometric shapes add just enough interest and movement to the design. Fair warning: Hooks are not supplied, so you’ll want to choose one that works well with your bathroom’s existing finishes.

BTTN 78-Inch Long Shower Curtain

Solids are the ultimate pairing to balance out a bathroom with patterned tiling or wallpaper, and this trustworthy curtain is backed by thousands of five-star reviews on Amazon. The heavy duty linen material is grounding and slightly casual, welcoming virtually any other bathroom decor into your space.
